__TOC__

  Contact: FruitieX
  Brand: ASUS Multimedia Notebook
  Model: M51Sn
  Website: http://www.asus.com/products.aspx?modelmenu=1&model=2026&l1=5&l2=74&l3=604&l4=0

Community Forum Discussion:
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=753679
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=894091

=== Current Issues ===

Some function key-combinations do not work (Internet, LCD/Ext display switch, Touchpad lock, "Asus Splendid Video", "Life Frame", "Power For Phone", "Power4Gear eXtreme"). None of them produce any output in xev.

Build in TV tuner not support by linux dvb driver (STK7700D chipset).

The hotkeys next to the power button don't work. None of them produce any output in xev.

The wireless switch only activates Bluetooth, have to press Fn+F2 in order to activate WLAN.

Audio works fine in 8.10, for 8.04 :
Have to add the following lines into /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base in order for sound to work :

<pre>
options snd-hda-intel enable=1 index=0 model=lenovo
alias snd-card-0 snd-hda-intel</pre>
